name: The First GDG Agadir Event
description:
Hey everyone !

We have the pleasure and the honor to inform you that we will organize our first event in Agadir, a WorkShop of Android development using the new language supported by Google Kotlin,  we would love to see you there !

What’s GDG :

Google Developer Groups (GDGs) are for developers who are interested in Google's developer technology, everything from the Android, Chrome, Drive, and Google Cloud platforms, to product APIs like the Cast API, Maps API, and YouTube API.

A GDG can take many forms, from just a few people getting together to watch our latest video, to large gatherings with demos and tech talks, to events like code sprints and hackathons. However, at the core, GDGs are focused on developers and technical content.

What’s kotlin :

Kotlin is a statically-typed programming language that runs on the Java virtual machine and also can be compiled to JavaScript source code or uses the LLVM compiler infrastructure. Its primary development is from a team of JetBrains programmers based in Saint Petersburg, Russia.[2] While the syntax is not compatible with Java, Kotlin is designed to interoperate with Java code and is reliant on Java code from the existing Java Class Library, such as the collections framework.

The name comes from Kotlin Island, near St. Petersburg. Andrey Breslav mentioned that the team decided to name it after an island just like Java was named after the Indonesian island of Java.

Kotlin is a fully supported programming language on Android.  ( Wikipedia )

name: Agadir Womentechmakers Meetup
description: Meetup with Womentechmakers Agadir.

name: Devfest 17 Agadir

venue.name: Ecole National des Sciences Appliquées Agadir

description:
DevFest Agadir is a part of the IT conference series around the world for developers, managers, students. It is organized by a non-profit community Google Developers Group. This year, the conference will take place on the 17th of December at ENSA, Agadir.

Main topics: Mobile Development, Moroccan Web, Modern Web Application Development, e-commerce and Interaction with experts. Awesome speakers and lots of fun!

A full day of workshops, hands-on experience, coding and debugging.

Come and tame your favorite technology !

name: Cloud Study Jam
description:
Confirmation emails have been sent out ! Check your inbox !!
Here's the list of the accepted ones: goo.gl/ctLKLE
PS: You only have 48h to confirm your attendance, or you will be replaced by someone else from the waitlist.

By registering in our "event registration form": goo.gl/dM9y9e, you are entering the waitlist directly. We are going to choose only 40 members to attend based on your answer for the 'Why you would like to attend?' question.
So please take that question seriously and try your best to provide us with all the reasons why you should be on the list.

the online registration will be closed by 12 pm on February 17. ONLY members who will RSVP Yes will be able to attend. Please read the details carefully here: goo.gl/rhUDa7 and feel free to ask if you have any questions.

The Agenda:
9:00 am: Welcome and registration.
9:30 am: Three Google Cloud Platform Essentials labs,
11:00pm: Break.
11:30 pm: Intro to Docker.
12:30 pm: Networking and close.

Want to get started on the Google Cloud, but don't know where
to begin?
Join us for our Cloud Study Jam! Together we'll work through
three Google Cloud Platform Essentials labs, then you will get
free access to the next quest so you can finish this series of labs
at home to get a Google-hosted badge for your online profile.
You will be able to get hands-on experience with Docker,
Kubernetes and Scientific Data Processing, which will earn you
additional badges.

Join this meetup to get official Google training, a $70+ value, free
of charge.

Bring a laptop (PC, Mac or Chromebook) ! The labs will run on all
of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best
experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome
installed.

name: WomentechMakers Agadir Day
description:
Au programme
In celebration of the International Women’s Day, WTM Agadir is pleased to announce the making of arrangements of a tech conference. The aim of this main event is to display the tasks performed by women in Tech on a daily basis.
This is a chance for all the interested spirts to come and learn more about this field and have a closer look on the procedures and the way this work is being handled.

À prendre avec vous

Important

Au programme

We will be in ENSA Tetouan to share our experience with our Colleagues in Tetouan, Talk about Android Business and a Study Jam Cloud ( GCP ) .

in partnership with GDG Tangiers and infotech.

À prendre avec vous

Important

name: Study Jams Mobile
description:
Au programme
Mobile Site Certification.

Learn about key technologies like mobile speed, PWA(Progressive Web Apps), AMP(Accelerated Mobile Pages) and web payments that are critical to developing and deploying modern mobile web sites and apps. Review require materials (takes 3-4 hours). Then take a Google-provided certification exam (90 minutes, multiple choice) to validate your knowledge.
Successful completion of the exam gives you a professional accreditation from Google that shows you have a proficiency in basic and advanced aspects of mobile website design and development. The credential will be listed on a Google Partners page and also provided as a printable certificate.
Hurry up and register here :
https://goo.gl/forms/C6mIbibihfhJWg8f2
Ps: the places are limited (only 40)

À prendre avec vous
- You need basic web development skills.
- A laptop (PC, Mac or Chromebook)

Important

name: Google IO Extended 2018

venue.name: Ecole National des Sciences Appliquées Agadir

description:
Google I/O (simply I/O) is an annual developer conference held by Google in Mountain View, California. I/O showcases technical in-depth sessions focused on building web, mobile, and enterprise applications with Google and open sources such as Android, Chrome and Chrome OS, APIs, Google Web Toolkit, App Engine, and more.

I/O was inaugurated in 2008, and is organized by the executive team. "I/O" stands for input/output, as well as the slogan "Innovation in the Open". The event's format is similar to Google Developer Day.

name: TensorFlow viewing party & ML CrashCourse StudyJam
description:
Hello Friends!

We’re super excited to bring Google's latest Machine Learning offering to GDG Agadir. This course is intended for those who wish to learn about ML from a practical, applied perspective that will enable them to use machine learning within their everyday projects, and who wish to benefit from the power of TensorFlow wrapped in convenient higher-level abstractions. This is a great opportunity for professionals, entrepreneurs and students to gain some practical experience in ML and TensorFlow.

What? The Machine Learning Crash Course with TensorFlow APIs.

This course will be suitable for you, if:
You are a strong programmer
Ideally, you are at least somewhat familiar with Python. You don't need to be an expert.
Ideally, you know at least a little about linear algebra and calculus.

Where? ENSA Agadir.

Format of this course
We will be walking you through MLCC, it’s modules and basic ML concepts. Additionally, we will have you go through selected modules of the course, with a teaching assistant guiding you in course’s practical pieces/exercises and troubleshooting and pieces of the content where you are struggling. The course is open to all so you can complete the remaining modules as a self-study after the session.

Other requirements ?
Additionally, we’d need you to bring:
Your laptop and charger. You will need this to go through the online course.
Pen & paper (or any other preferable option if you plan to take notes)

name: Devfest Agadir 2018

venue.name: Ecole National des Sciences Appliquées Agadir

description:
Devfest Agadir 2018 !

Just a few Weeks left to our next and biggest event for this year: DevFest “Developers Festival” it's a common event for all GDG chapters around the globe. An amazing opportunity and a perfect event for developers, managers and students to get inspired and learn about the newest tools and features of different topics such as Mobile, Web, e-commerce ... and Interaction with experts.
DevFest Agadir 2018, is two days of workshops, Codelabs, Hackathons, hands-on experience, coding and debugging.
The event is FREE of charge. Save the date, and be ready !
You are about to experience a very interesting and wondrous weekend.
